column4: /sbin/mount.davfs: Program is not setuid root. what does this mean when mounting a Davfs volume
Probably need to run it under sudo.
Not familiar with davfs, but you might be able to enable the "users" option in the fstab.
The solution is probably to set the setuid bit on the binary, but that's a security issue.
i tried setting uid=1000 but i got this error Could not open pid-file.
